Unexpectedly, their brotherhood is turned to enmity owing to an intelligence.

programme.title: Ruse of Engagement - EP 5
programme.desc: Widow TONG SUK-FAN (Louise Lee) is saddled with hardship alone, struggling to bring up her two sons CHONG YAU-CHING (Ruco Chan) and CHONG YAU-KIT (Ron Ng). The brothers join the Intelligence Unit and the Operations Unit of Anti-Terrorist Force respectively, and both gain recognition from their superior SHUM CHI-NGO (Eddie Kwan), which is supposed to be a comfort to their mother. Unexpectedly, their brotherhood is turned to enmity owing to an intelligence.

programme.title: Virtues of Harmony II - EP 87
programme.desc: In the early 1980s’, everyone knows about GUCCI (SIT KA YIN, NANCY). She was the most beautiful woman in the police force and many men were after her. After getting married, GUCCI took good care of her family, especially after her husband died. She brought up her step-sons, NIN (LAM MAN LUNG, FRANKIE) and YUE (TSE TIN WAH, MICHAEL), and step-daughter, YAT (CHAN YIN HANG, JOYCE). She also manages the restaurant, ‘Honey Cave’, which her husband has left her.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Xiao Zhuang is a professional killer who accidentally blinds a young nightclub singer Jenny in a gunfire action. He must quickly raise a lot of money for Jenny's corneal transplantation but his action draws the attention of a detective who is investigating the case. Will Xiao Zhuang be arrested and can Jenny restore her sight?

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters' best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong's toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: Mother VS Mother
programme.desc: Guan De Xing fell in love with Li Xiao Yun when he was young, but was opposed by his mother and had to marry Zhou Shen Yu. Since then, Li holds a grudge against Zhou. Unfortunately, the son of Guan and Zhou falls in love with Li's daughter, and as the two mothers meet, they start brawling again!

programme.title: Fat Choi Spirit
programme.desc: Andy is a mahjong master who is very popular in the neighbourhood. However, after being cursed by his ex-girlfriend, Andy always experiences bad luck when playing mahjong. Can he finally dodge this streak of bad luck?

programme.title: The Medallion
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Eddie is hired by the Interpol to capture a human smuggling gang leader known as Snakehead. Eddie dies in an action to protect a sacred child from being kidnapped, but is brought back to life by the child's magical medallion, allowing him to finally kill Snakehead.

programme.title: Iron Monkey
programme.desc: Dr Yang leads a secret life as Iron Monkey, stealing from the rich and giving it to the poor. Unable to arrest Iron Monkey, the officials force martial arts master Wong Kei Ying to find the masked thief by detaining his son Wong Fei Hung. However, after witnessing the corruption in the government, Kei Ying decides to join Iron Monkey to fight back.

programme.title: The Truth: Final Episode
programme.desc: Raymond's lawyer licence is suspended as he has prevented the course of justice to clear his mother's conviction. He is subsequently framed for murder with every piece of evidence pointing towards him. The only one with proof of his innocence is his dying mother, who fights to stay alive long enough to exonerate her son before it is too late.

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: Armour of God
programme.desc: Jackie, the Asian Hawk, steals treasures from remote places and resells them at a good price. He finds the mysterious and legendary "Armour of God" and sells it to the Earl. When terrorists kidnap his ex-girlfriend Laura in exchange for the "Armour of God", Jackie borrows it from the Earl for a final showdown with the terrorists to save her.

programme.title: The Sparrow
programme.desc: Kei is an experienced "Sparrow", a pickpocket who likes to take photos of the people and events around him. One day, a mysterious yet beautiful woman, Jenny, appears in his viewfinder and Kei is instantly attracted to her. Jenny's beauty fascinates Kei, but behind this attractive facade lies a mysterious past and a secret mission...

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: This third installment of 'The Eye' horror movie series is about the creepy adventures of a group of teenagers who summon spirits by using the ten methods outlined in a mysterious comic book while vacationing in Thailand.

programme.title: The Illegal Immigrant
programme.desc: This is a gritty and realistic Chinatown tale about the life of a Chinese illegal immigrant and his journey in New York. He is looking for a fake marriage with a girl so as to gain the right of abode there. Despite all the hardships and misfortunes, he tries to cope with life and reach for his dreams.

programme.title: Everyday Is Valentine
programme.desc: OK is a serial liar who constantly bends the truth to get his way. One day, he meets his dream girl, Wonderful and pretends to be a rich man in order to win her heart. However, Wonderful has sworn that she will never love a man who lies. Can OK stop lying and win his dream girl's heart?

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: The Longest Nite
programme.desc: Two triad leaders, George and Kei, negotiate to join forces. As a bounty of $5 million is put on killing George, Kei assigns Sam, a corrupt cop who is also his right-hand man, to stop the killers. In the process, Sam meets a bald killer Tony, who stalks him and causes him troubles. When Sam realizes he is being set up, it was already too late...

programme.title: Don't Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A cop has the ability to see ghosts, which is something that has been passed down from generation to generation in his family. He must learn how to manage this gift when he is confronted by the ghost of a notorious criminal whom he has shot.

programme.title: Bullet and Brain
programme.desc: Nine years ago, two legendary criminals, Bullet and Brain, vowed not to kill and lie before they disappeared. Both now return for a mission - to protect the granddaughter of the triad boss. Can they succeed without breaking their vows?

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Ma Wing Jing and his brother arrive in Shanghai to make their fortune. Befriending a powerful mobster Tam, Ma is given his nightclub when he saves Tam's life. Ma's fortune rises but he must overcome the corruption and violence to survive.

programme.title: City of Desire
programme.desc: Sister 13 returns to Macau after 17 years to succeed her father's underground empire, the prostitution business. She tries to stop their exploitation of the sex workers, but Macau's economy flourished after the handover, propelling the prostitution and gambling businesses. The city is blinded by desire and Sister 13 can do nothing to help...

programme.title: Aces Go Places IV
programme.desc: An international crime syndicate wants the superpower prism invented by a New Zealand professor, who has entrusted it and his daughter to King Kong's care before he dies. Back in Hong Kong, King Kong passes the prism to Baldy but this leads to his wife and son being kidnapped by the syndicate. King Kong and Baldy go to New Zealand for the rescue!

programme.title: Flash Point
programme.desc: Sergeant Ma Jun is a hot-headed cop who vows to take down three powerful triad drug dealing brothers. His fellow officer, Wilson, is an experienced undercover agent working within the triad gang. They both agree to a partnership, but when Wilson's cover is blown, Jun is forced to confront the gang with the only way he knows - his fists.

programme.title: A Hero Never Dies
programme.desc: Jack and Martin admire each other, but they work for two different underworld bosses. During a fight in Thailand, Martin is crippled while Jack is seriously wounded. Both men are left behind by their bosses, and their girlfriends killed. It is time for the heroes to team up and fight back...

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the "Gang of Five" in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Peacock King
programme.desc: Ashura, daughter of the King of Hell, is awakened by evil spirit Raga who brings her to modern day Tokyo to wreak havoc. With the key to Hell's Gate, Ashura can set her father free from imprisonment. Two young men, Peacock and Fruit, meet in Tokyo with the same mission to stop Ashura. They team up after knowing each other and becoming friends.

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price...

programme.title: The Gambling Ghost
programme.desc: Sammo Hung plays three roles: Fatty, Fatty's father and grandfather. Hoping to become rich, hotel staff Fatty dives into gambling with his friend to the dismay of his father. When Fatty hits rock bottom, his grandfather's ghost appears to help him. As Fatty finds out that his grandfather was murdered, he vows to avenge his death.

programme.title: Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung
programme.desc: The Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung is a group of anti-Ching martial artists who have killed a Ching official. Years later, when five disciples and descendants of Ten Tigers meet one night, one of them is killed by the son of the late Ching official who returns with a vengeance. They must fight against him to protect the Ten Tigers clan...

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: One Way Only
programme.desc: Danny is a motorbike workshop owner, once was a renowned motorcycle racer, but were seriously injured in an illegal race. Mai, student of Danny, wins a race in Macau under Danny's help. However, because of money and honour, Mai joins illegal races. After knowing this, Li persuades Mai to stop illegal races, but Mai seems cannot find his way out...

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: If the two big villains Winged Tiger and Underworld King join forces, the martial arts world will be plunged into chaos. This evil union is set to occur with the marriage of the Underworld King's sister and the Winged Tiger. Can this dangerous duo be stopped before one says "I do"?

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: The 14 Amazons
programme.desc: The Yang family had served their country in Song Dynasty for generations. When General Yang is ambushed and killed during the war in Jin Shan, the grand matriarch led the entire family to take revenge and defend the country.

programme.title: The Kung-fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wong's caught in the Mong's territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Ping's limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: The Supreme Swordsman
programme.desc: After beating several famous swordsmen, Chin Wu Hsin of the Mo Shan clan challenges Supreme Swordsman to a duel, hoping to win his title, and is beaten and humiliated. The winner taunts him to find a Supreme Sword made by Old Eagle, a famous sword-maker. When his offer to buy a sword from Old Eagle, is turned down, he challenges Old Eagle to a duel, and snatches his sword in a foul play. Old Eagle's own son Shih Yen-peh vows to avenge for his father...

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: The Tea House
programme.desc: Real-life champion martial artist Chen Kuan-Tai plays a powerful role in this memorable saga of action and romance; fighting against gangsters for his true love.

programme.title: The Champion
programme.desc: After years in prison, Lu Hu returns home to find himself set up by his ruthless brother Piao, who has taken over the family coal mine business and imprisoned their sister. Hu takes down Piao and saves his sister but their coal mine falls into the hands of a Japanese gang, which Hu and his sister must fight in order to get it back.

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all Shaolin disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone except for five disciples. To take revenge on the Qing court, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become "The Five Shaolin Masters".

programme.title: Sex, Love and Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong society's differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: This was one of top three films of 1970 and winner of "Outstanding Drama" at the 9th Golden Horse Awards. The evil minister uses twelve golden medallions to summon war hero Yueh Fei back from the frontline and execute him. A group of wandering warriors, led by Yueh Hua and Chin Ping, try to stop the medallion couriers.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: All Men are Brothers
programme.desc: This is a sequel to Chang Cheh's epic "The Water Margin", and follows the patriotic story of seven warriors in the band of 108 outlaws at Mount Liang. The magnificent seven battle against the despotic government officials to save their country.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: Dawn will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent's consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her...

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jin's daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: The Silver Fox
programme.desc: The formidable swordswoman Silver Fox was a child when her father was senselessly wounded by his step brother, and her mother raped. It is payback time eighteen years later, as her father trains her up with kung fu to take revenge on his behalf.

programme.title: The Lady Hermit
programme.desc: The Lady Hermit hides away for years to plot revenge after being defeated by the evil Black Knight. Young swordswoman Tsui Ping is determined to take down Black Knight herself and begs Lady Hermit to teach her martial arts skills. The Black Knight's days are numbered when the Lady Hermit and her protege perfect the technique to take him down.

programme.title: Shaolin Martial Arts
programme.desc: The Qing government assigns fighters to destroy Shaolin Temple and kill all the disciples, but two of them successfully escaped. They train under different masters and learn the Wing Chun and Hung Quan styles respectively, finally killing the fighters and taking revenge for the death of their fellow disciples.

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: Adapted from the classic Chinese novel of the same title, the story follows Monk Tang San Zang's journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back...

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand worth of silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master "Shadow Whip", he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to "Shadow Whip"?

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: The Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: Ma Teng is an assassin of the 'Flying Guillotine Squad', a group of killers commissioned by the Emperor Yung. When Ma starts to question the morality of his missions, he finds himself becoming a fugitive hunted by his former comrades.

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Citizens' Subjects
programme.desc: Citizens' Subjects utilizes the perspective of Taiwan people and Taiwan events to tell the stories of Taiwan. It takes a light-hearted, humorous approach to interpreting current affairs.

programme.title: Battle ATM
programme.desc: Creating a brand-new interactive ATM that combined with puzzle solving and daily life! Guests can win money by taking three rounds of intellectual challenges from the ATM, turn wisdom into money!_x000D_Futuristic program scenes with video game clearing concept, where challengers engage in the intellectual competition to switch on the ATM. Those who won goes to the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: Global Focus
programme.desc: Bringing you the latest political, economy, information technology and breaking news around the world.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: Battle ATM
programme.desc: Creating a brand-new interactive ATM that combined with puzzle solving and daily life! Guests can win money by taking three rounds of intellectual challenges from the ATM, turn wisdom into money!_x000D_Futuristic program scenes with video game clearing concept, where challengers engage in the intellectual competition to switch on the ATM. Those who won goes to the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: Super Taste Plus
programme.desc: Super Taste focuses on funny travel style to discover destinations and local-dishes. Standing on audience's view point, program's hosts introduce every sightseeing sites with close-witness, young and humorous way to announce the spirits of Super Taste.

programme.title: Focus World News
programme.desc: A news programme that provides the latest international and Taiwan news, as well as in-depth analyses of important issues around the world.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: New_Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: New_Super Taste Plus
